name: D365_AccessTeamTemplates
description: Create or Update access team templates using a configuration file
author: Vikas Rajan

inputs.name: connectionstring
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please refer [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/developer/common-data-service/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#connection-string-parameters) for the connection string syntax

inputs.name: configfile
inputs.label: Configuration File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path to the configuration file. The file should have details about access team templates in a json format. The file can also be generted using 'Export Access Team Templates' task.
